name: mcp-propstack
description: MCP server for PropStack real estate API integration with context-optimized bandwidth handling

api_key.title: PropStack API Key
api_key.description: Your PropStack API key (read-only permissions recommended)

tools.name: propstack_search_properties
tools.description: Search properties with filters. Returns overview: id, unit_id, name, city, street, status, price, living_space, rooms. Context-optimized without expand=1 (75% less data).

tools.name: propstack_get_property
tools.description: Get complete details for a specific property by unit_id. Returns all 275 fields including images, descriptions, and detailed features.

tools.name: propstack_list_statuses
tools.description: List all available property statuses with their IDs
